inn1.comm: Right. here we go. Good ball first-up. It bounces from short of length on the middle, straightens a touch, worked to the on side.

Almost a run out there. Some drama to start the proceedings. Imran hit a cracking square-cut to right of backward point where Kohli dived to make a good half-stop. The ball went to Raina at covers and he had a throw at the non-striker's end but misses. Had he hit, he would have got a run out
again, short in length, around that off stump, Akmal cuts hard this time and again, Kohli makes a diving stop
closer to the off stump, pushed away to Kohli
length delivery comes in a bit, bounces as well, Kamran is cramped up, hops to defend and the ball evades the waft to hit him high on the pad
on the middle stump line, dabbed to square-leg. One run from the tight over. Of course helped by two fine stops from Kohli.
Crash! The first boundary of the game. It was full in length around the off stump, Imran leans forward to drive it in the air but right between mid-off and the non-striker.
short in length, moves in a bit to hit the pad high and rolls away towards gully for a leg bye
It was slightly over pitched and Akmal drives it superbly inside-out through extra cover. Finme shot.
gets forward to defend a length delivery
gets forward to play his favourite square drive. He hits it in the air but right between cover and point fielders.
And RP, in trying to bowl it straighter, slips this one down the leg side. Pressure.
short in length, moves towards the off stump, Akmal is squared-up, nothing alarming, just opens-up a little to adjust to the movement and pushes the ball towards point
on the middle and leg, straightening from short of length, bounces as well, Imran tries to whip it away, misses and is struck on the pad
Whack! Top shot. It was short in length and tad outside off, Imran stayed adjacent to the line and whacked it on the up and through extra cover. As they say in the caribbean, not a man move.
And so, Nehra gets this one straighter, on the middle and off line and Imran respects the line by pushing it back down the pitch

shout for lbw but turned down. Missing leg. It was fuller, pitched on the leg stump, shaped in a bit and hit the pad on the leg stump line. To the naked eye, it looked it would have gone down and hawk eye also shows that it would have just brushed the leg stump. Safe decision to make.
ah! Imran tries to pull this out of the ground and edges it to his body. It was short in length and on the stumps, he went for the shot but couldn't connect properly
on the pads, clipped down to fine-leg for a single. Good start from Pakistan. For India, Nehra has looked the better of the two bowlers so far.
full in length on the off stump, Imran gets forward to defend it towards short mid-off
length delivery curving in towards the middle stump, Imran was leaning across, stops his movement as he was getting cramped up and nudges the ball to the on side.
Really good shot this. It was short in length, on the off stump, not much room but Imran stood tall on the back foot  to punch it sweetly back past the non-striker. Fabulous shot. Easy on the eye.
on the middle and leg, short in length, whipped to deep square-leg and by the time Nehra moves across from deep backward square-leg, they collect two runs.
really full in length, some swing, on the off stump line, Imran pushes it out to Raina at covers.. Crowd catch as they say. Raina smiles.

Oh... what a shot. Gem. It was short in length, he moved back, shifted his weight superbly before punching it through the covers. Classy. I am sure many of his fans would have gone, " Mazza aa gaya"! (immense fun).
on the middle and leg, moving in, tickled down to Ishant at fine-leg

India strike. The Indian section in the crowd roar. Imran Nazir falls after a delightful cameo. It bounced from short of length on the off stump line, angling away,  Imran went for the pull but top edged it to mid-on where Harbhajan screams in joy after taking it. A thrilling innings, that promised so much more, comes to an end.
on a length, around the off and middle, straightening, defended to the off side
just outside off stump, Akmal pushes it out towards covers
length delivery on the off stump line, Akmal is caught at the crease and defends out to the off side
Akmal goes for the pull and pulls it off. This one, unlike that of Imran's, was much shorter and Akmal, a better puller any day, slams it high over midwicket.
back of length, moving in towards middle stump, deflected to midwicket
cuts in from outside off, Younis had pressed his left leg across a tad too much, stops that movement, gets the bat in front of the pad to defend...
slips towards the pads and Younis says thank you and glances it away to the fine-leg boundary.
shorter and wider outside off stump, Younis lashes out, cuts it to left of covers where Raina dives but doesn't stop it.
short in length, cuts in towards the middle, Younis pushes it out to the on side
fuller, around 130 kmph, delivery on the off stump line, Younis is caught at the crease, drives it in the air and Rahul Dravid, at short extra cover, lunges to his right but doesn't get to the ball.
on the leg and middle, Younis stumbles a bit but pushes it to deep backward square-leg
back of length, curves in towards middle, not much room, and Akmal defends to the on side
on the middle, shaping in, deflected through midwicket
Shot! It was not all that short but Akmal is ready and latches on it with a fine pull. He picks another boundary and Pakistan race along nicely.
short in length, moving in towards the middle, Akmal stabs it off the inner edge
length delivery on the leg and middle, Akmal whips it to the right of short midwicket fielder for couple of runs.
back of length, cutting in towards the off stump, pushed cautiously to the on side of the pitch.
short in length, bounces towards the off stump, Younis pushes it back down the pitch.
moves in towards the middle, from back of a length, turned to midwicket
full in length delivery this time, moving in from outside off, Younis opens the bat-face to steer it to backward point
short in length, lands outside off and moves in towards middle, Younis defends to the off side
shorter in length, tad wide outside off, Younis goes for the cut and gets it down to third man
pushed well across Younis who reaches out to guide it to third man for a single.
full in length, angling away from Akmal who tries to punch it on the up but ends up mistiming it past the non-striker
straightens on the middle stump, whipped straight to short midwicket
full in length, good ball curving in, and Akmal defends cautiously

Dragged on! It was pushed across Akmal who went for the forcing shot on the off side but ended up dragging it to his stumps . He didn't pick the length properly this time. The batsman always feels a touch unlucky when he gets out this way but that's that. he was looking pretty solid out there but he is gone now.
in the zone outside off stump, full in length, left alone
back of a length, just outside off stump, Younis mistimes the punchy drive to the off side
full in length, moves in towards the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler
outside off stump, back of length, straightens a bit, Younis hops back to try get on top of the bounce but doesn't get much power behind the punchy stroke.
full in length, shapes in from outside off stump, Younis leans forward to defend
short in length, bounces outside off, Younis goes back and across to steer it to backward point
full in length, lands on the middle, shapes in, Younis tries to work it to the on side, misses and is struck on the pad... going down leg
on the off stump line, Malik glides forward to push it to the off side
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
straightens on the middle stump and Malik defends it compactly straight down the pitch.
shout for lbw. It landed back of a length just outside leg stump and hits the pad around the leg stump line.
angles across Malik who goes back and across to push it out to cover
on the middle stump line, short in length, Malik stands on his toes to wrist it past square-leg for a single. Another tight over from Nehra.

surprises Malik with a really full delivery and shouts out an lbw appeal. But going down leg, Malik stumbled at the crease as he didn't expect the ball to be so full, stopped his front-foot movement and tried to get the bat on ball but missed it.
full in length, sort of holds its line outside off, left alone
full in length and outside off stump, again left alone
full in length outside off stump, Malik is late in getting forward and mistimes the drive to the off side.
tries the bouncer outside off, Malik drops his wrists, gets the bat out of the way as he sways away

130.9 lmph length delivery on the off stump line, Malik punches it on the up but straight to mid-off. Another tight over from India. The pressure is slowly turning the other side after those wickets. Interesting battle on.
RP is back but starts off with a wide down the leg side. This could be in the phase where Pakistan will try to get the momentum back. How will RP bowl?
drifts to the pads again, clipped to deep square-leg region for two runs. Sachin dived to his right at square-leg but couldn't stop the ball
gets the line to the off stump and lands it on a length, Younis pushes it out to cover
fantastic stop from Raina at cover. It was full and wide, Younis lashed it well to the left of Raina who took a step and dived full stretch to intercept it

almost caught and bowled. It perhaps stopped a bit on the batsman, who pushed at it, bottom-hand off the handle, and it was in the air. RP moved towards the ball and lunged forward but the ball dipped on him and fell just short of him. The
length delivery on the middle, punched away to mid-on
angling away from Younis who defends to the off side
really full outside off, Malik is again late in getting forward, reaches out to drive and edges it down to third man. He seems to be expecting every ball from Ishant to land short of length.
back of length, moves in towards middle and off, Younis' bat comes outside the line and he ends up jabbing it to the off side
short and wide, Younis cuts it hard to left of point where the fielder dives to make a half-stop
full in length, moving in towards the off stump, Younis pushes it out to cover
short in length, cuts in towards middle and off, Younis stays back, gets right behind the line to defend
short and really wide and Younis accepts the gift with glee; he rocked back to cut it really stylishly to the point boundary.
back of length, angling away on the off stump line, tapped close to the off side
drifts to the pads, clipped to fine-leg where Ishant moves quickly to his right and releases the throw immediately
from round the stumps for the first time today, moves it in towards off stump, defended to the on side

That round the stumps angle works for RP. He started it during the tour of England, it helped him then and it has helped him now. It straightened a bit outside off from back of length and Younis nowhere close to the ball, lunged out at it and stabbed it  off the outer edge to Dhoni. India have got back into the game really well after that fine start from Akmal and Imran.
on the stumps, turned away quietly
moves in from outside off stump, defended to the off side
pretty full in length - he has done that now and then against Malik and has surprised him every time - Malik stumbles at the crease, trying to hold his balance and edges the ball to square-leg
just outside off stump, moving in, Malik bends his knees, holds balance and plays a late cut .... Harbhajan moves to his left from third man and dives but ends up pushing the ball to the boundary
similar delivery, this time Malik guides it straight down to Harbhajan
short of length around the off stump, Yousuf gets solidly behind the line to defend to the off side
bangs it short and it remains outside off, Yousuf allows it to pass him
goes for another bouncer but too high ... wide ..
short in length, outside off stump, left alone
from round the stumps, length delivery moving in, moves past the defensive waft and hits the pad
bangs in a bouncer around off stump, left alone
on the middle stump line, still from that round the stumps angle, deflected to midwicket
another short delivery, on the middle, Malik ducks under it.
fuller in length, on the middle stump again, good spell this from RP, Malik lunges forward to defend it towards cover
again coming in towards the middle and off, defended out to the off side .. not much room to play with
full in length on the off stump line, driven to long-off
similar delivery and Malik drives it to long-off for another single
full in length on the off, wristed back down the pitch and the ball hits the stumps at the other end
slower leg cutter, Yousuf reaches out to guide it to third man
drops it short and outside off, Malik pushes it towards long-on for a single.
drags it short again but escapes punishment again! It was pulled but straight to deep midwicket.
floated on the middle, nudged to the on side
slower this time, just outside off, Yousuf leans across to wrist it past square-leg
turns in towards off stump, Malik goes back to dab it to the onside
slows up the pace, flighted outside off, defended on the front foot
turns in with bounce, Malik was on the look out for the cut but was cramped up and dabs it down to backward point
goes right back to push the off break to cover
leans forward to defend to the off side
gets forward to drive to long-on
fuller in length, outside off stump, Malik reaches out to drive to right of sweeper cover where RP runs to his right and makes a complete mess of it. It should have been easily stopped.
leans across to drive through covers
shorter, moving in towards the middle and leg, glanced towards fine-leg where Nehra dives just about in time to get his body behind it...
slower, on the middle stump line, dabbed to backward square-leg for a single ..
flighted outside off on a length, Yousuf lunges forward to defend but is surprised by the turn and the bounce .. the ball brushes the pad and goes to Dhoni ...
stretches well forward to drive down to long-off
turns in towards middle and off, nudged to short fine-leg
stays back to push it to the on side but not much power behind it and the straightish midwicket stops it
quicker,. turns in towards off stump, Malik hurries back to defend.
slows up the pace, on a length outside off, Malik stretches forward to push it to covers
Shot! Again, Kohli drags it short - he has survived on the previous occasions - and Yousuf pulls it to wide midwicket boundary
on a length, slipping towards leg and middle, whipped through midwicket for a single
fullish, on the middle and off, Malik gets forward to scoop it over the bowler for a single
on the middle, pushed to the on side , Kohli rushes across and dives to stop a single
the slow leg cutter, turned from outside off to backward square-leg region
skids in from outside off, full in length, steered to short third man
floated full o n the off stump line, turned to square-leg
comes down the track, Yusuf shortens the length and Malik works it to midwicket
fuller, on the off, wristed past square-leg
slows up the pace, flighted on the off stump line, driven to long-on
another single courtesy a wristy waft past square-leg
from round the stumps, overpitched delivery on the legs, flicked away but straight to deep backward square-leg ... lucky RP there ... And that's Pakistan's 100
from wide of the crease, full delivery moves in, flicked towards midwicket.
length delivery outside off stump, pushed towards deep point region for a single
takes it from the middle line and deflects it past square-leg to rotate the strike
straightens outside off, from round the stumps, chopped down to third man
on a length, on the middle, tucked to the on side
flighted on the middle, turned past midwicket for a single
on the middle and leg, dabbed to backward square-leg
skips down the track but Yusuf adjusts superbly to slow up the pace further, loopy delivery, jabbed to the on side
gets forward to drive to long-on
flighted around off stump, driven past the non-striker and past the diving bowler for a  single
goes right back to clip the off break to Ishant at deep backward square-leg
keeps low after landing outside off, Malik crouches to keep it out to the on side
quicker, on the middle and leg, wristed away through the on side
slower, just outside off stump, turned to short fine-leg
stays back to work the off break well to the left of short fine-leg
full, outside off, Malik stretches across to work it from there past square-leg for another single
quicker, fuller, on the middle, edged to right of short fine-leg fielder for a single
flighted around the off stump, driven to Harbhajan at long-on
turns in from outside off, dabbed past square-leg for a single .. The pitch is aiding turn
quicker, just outside off, Yousuf stays back to push it behind the wicket on the off side to bring up the fifty partnership
leans forward to tickle it to square-leg for a single
slows up the pace, flighted delivery outside off, turns in and Yousuf is struck on the front foot and defends
moves forward to on drive to long-on for a single
stays back to whip the off break turning into leg stump to deep square-leg

on the middle and leg, swept to short fine-leg where Virat Kohli makes a superb diving stop to his right and releases the throw to Dhoni ... Shastri thinks, rightly, that Dhoni should have been behind the stumps to put some pressure on Yousuf ...
slightly short in length, cut away to deep point
flighted outside off stump, Malik lunges out to play inside the line and is beaten
flighted outside off, Malik gets onto the front foot and defends against the turn
fired down the leg side, and Dhoni has no chance here
goes back to outside off, flights it well, Malik defends it solidly
drives it down to long-on for one
flighted delivery, Malik looks to defend, this one bounces but he manages to keep it down
steps out, turns it down to file leg
gets right down to the front foot, and turns it around the corner for one
looks to flick a fullish delivery, but can't beat midwicket
shorter, and into the pads, and easily nurdled away for one
well flighted, dips a touch, and Malik is short of the pitch and ends up defending it
plays this one with soft hands, and takes a sharp single to point
too full, Yousuf flicks, but can't beat midwicket
way down the leg side, totally lost his line here
another ball way down the leg side, Yousuf overbalances playing the sweep, Dhoni makes a difficult take and there is time enough for Yousuf to get back
short, on the leg stump, turned away for one
topspinner, across Malik, late cuts it, Yusuf makes a brilliant diving save at short third
on the leg stump, flicked away for one
lands on a length and moves towards off, pushed out towards point, malik thinks there is a single but Yosuf is no mood to find out the answer to that thought
Nehra is bowling over the stumps btw. Full and outside off, chopped away to third man
outside off stump, steered wide off Ishant at third man.
bangs it in short and it climbs past the attempted cut and rushes to Dhoni
slower one, on the middle and leg, turned to square-leg
angled outside off, cut away for a single
on the middle and off, turned to midwicket
steps forward and heaves it from outside off to deep midwicket. He was looking to be aggressive there but couldn't quite time the shot well
Classy late cut! It was the off break outside off, Yousuf glided back to play a deft looking late cut ... neat
stays back to work it to square-leg for a single ..
quicker outside off, Malik tries the late cut not but doesn't quite time it as well as Yousuf and Harbhajan dives to his left at short third man to cut it
quickish, on the off stump, dabbed towards Harbhajan for a single
from over the stumps, flighted around off, turned to short midwicket
slows up the pace, gives it more air, on the off, on driven to long-on
quicker, short in length outside off, nudged towards short third man for a single
flighted full around off stump, worked to deep midwicket for a single
Malik gets the late cut working superbly this time. He went back, waited for the off break to turn in and glided it to the third man boundary
tossed up outside off, full, whipped to short midwicket
Another classy late cut from Yousuf. Treat to watch. He waited on that backfoot and chopped it through the vacant slip region ... Yusuf holds his head! Harbhaan now moves finer at short third-man
dabbed away towards Harbhajan for a run
quicker, straighter on the middle, worked past square-leg for a single
flighted around off stump, on driven to long-on
short in length outside offm, Malik backs away and adjusts to the slightly lower bounce and cuts it to backward point boundary. 100 of the partnership up. Pakistan are moving along very nicely here.
turns in towards off stump, nudged to backward point for a single
stretches forward to drive it down to long-on
leans across to square-drive for a single. That's his 50. Serene. Well composed. Completely under control.
on the middle stump line, turned to backward square-leg for a single
slows up the pace, tosses it outside off, Yousuf goes for that late cut but is beaten .. this time
leans across to work the flighted delivery from outside off to short midwicket
slower in the air, lands outside off on a length, Yousuf stretches across to defend
short and wide to start with and Malik reaches out to flash it away to the point boundary. He reaches his 32nd ODI Fifty. Cautious start but he is gliding along now.
short in length outside off, cut down to third man
full in length, straightens outside off, guided to third man
Short and wide again from Ishant. Malik can't be more happy. He cuts it over backward point. Whack!
angling away from Malik who tries to cut but misses it.

Ah! short and wide again, Malik frees his arms and gets a thickish edge down to third man boundary. Poor over from Ishant. Pakistan are on top here. Great platform to really lash out in the end overs.
waits for the off break to turn in before placing it wide of short fine-leg
leans forward to drive it to long-on
turns in from outside off, worked to short midwicket
on the off stump line, full, wristed to deep backward square-leg ... Yousuf and Harbhajan have a friendly chat and both smile
gets forward to wrist it to the right of short midwicket where Raina makes yet another fine diving stop
goes for the quicker one but drags it very short and Malik rocks back to cut it down to the point boundary. Crash!
Poor bowling continues. overpitched delivery from round the stumps outside leg, flicked away where Gambhir makes a sliding stop. RP was lucky to get away with that
Bang! Yousuf glides forward to lift the full length delivery superbly over wide mid-off region. No one is stopping that.
clips this one through midwicket for a single
full pitched outside off, driven hard but straight to sweeper cover
bangs in a bouncer, pulled down to fine-leg
full in length on the middle and off, driven down to long-on. 200 up for Pakistan. They are looking really good for a big total here. Can they carry on?
on the off stump line, punched to the on side, Raina gets across from midwicket to stop
lunges out to turn it to short fine-leg, he sets off for a single, sent back quickly by Yousuf and he gets back in time
Fine skillful shot. Harbhajan drags it short again, Malik goes back to cut it to deep backward point boundary.
charges down the track and drives it hard to left of long-on where Yusuf makes a diving stop
quicker, on the off stump on a length, punched on the up to long-on
turns towards pads, turned to backward square-leg for a single
short and slightly wide, Yousuf reaches out to cut but misses out
from wide of the crease, full in length ,angling in from that round the stumps, Yousuf edges the intended drive to his pad
fuller, on the off and middle, driven to long-off
length delivery outside off, punched down to Kohli at backward point
full toss on the off stump line, Malik stayed adjacent to the line, opened the bat-face and just timed it .. superb piece of timing. Yusuf Pathan charges across and dived but couldn't stop it
Top shot! Full pitched outside off and Malik lashes it past two points (Dhoni had just placed an extra man there after the previous four) and gets it down to the boundary. Flayed away!
turns in sharply this time , bounces to hit the pad
waits for the ball to turn before placing it past square-leg
short in length, spins in, Malik stands tall to punch it to wide long-on region and they complete two runs
Neat. Malik is rocking on here. Especially those creamy cut shots. he backed away this time, waited and waited before cutting it to deep backward point boundary
quicker, fuller, tries to work it to the on side, gets a leading edge down to long-off
leans forward to flick it for a single
rushes past the off stump and Dhoni collects ...
full in length, angling away, on the off stump line, steered through point
on the middle and off, pushed square of the wicket for a single
on the middle and leg line, dabbed to square-leg for a single
the bouncer arrives, surprises Malik who has waft at it and top edges it towards long-leg
on the middle and off line, turned to backward of square-leg
leans forward to tap it close on the off side for a quick single
on the middle stump line, whipped away to Ishant at deep midwicket
from round the stumps, well outside leg stump, misses the sweep and collects the wide
gets across to square drive it through point

top spinner from round the stumps, but drops it slightly short, Malik goes back to cut it to third man boundary. 100 up for Malik. The players in the dressing room give him a standing ovation. Yusuf congratulates him in the middle. The crowd roar in delight.
on the leg and middle, flicked away for a single
The runs keep coming in. And in some style too, Yousuf glides forward to caress a square drive past backward point and well clear of the third man fielder
length delivery on the middle and off, dabbed away to third man
clears his front leg and has a big swing to the on side but edges the intended slog to his pad
slightly slower, off cutter, cut high above Kohli who jumped forward and got a hand to it but couldn't hold on. It was very very difficult chance... good fielding actually
fullish, whipped through the on side
Thump. He cleared the front leg and crashed the length delivery over the bowler and to the straight boundary.
floated outside off on a length, Yousuf waits before playing a reverse sweep past Tendulkar at short third man
some bounce there. Topspinner outside off, Yousuf goes for the cut but is surprised by the extra bounce and has a very close look at where it pitched.
Yousuf da maan. Another very short delivery, Yousuf waits for it before lifting it over the off-side field ... "No doubt the Indian bowlers have been rattled, " says Shastri.
leans forward to flick it through midwicket for a single
goes for the big swing to a delivery outside off stump and edges it to square-leg
on the off stump line, reverse paddled to Tendulkar at short third man
moves outside leg, Nehra follows him, pushed away to the off side for a single
Malik moves outside leg this time and lifts it to left of long-off
slower one, Malik moves around his crease, backs away to the leg side and cuts it down to third man
walks to outside off this time, Nehra hurls it full outside off, flicked to midwicket
low full toss outside off, yorker goes awry, Yousuf was walking towards off side, stops his movement to swing it away to wide midwicket boundary.

Done in by the slightly slower one. Yousuf moved outside leg and went through with the cut shot too early. He is not too happy with himself but what a fine innings this has been. He was the man who turned things around for Pakistan today. In his last nine ODI innings he had scored 185 - average 20.55, highest 43 .. what a time to turn it all around. Classy knock. Great to watch. Enter Shahid Afridi.
tries to give the strike over to Afridi with a dab towards long-on but the bowler intercepts
quicker one, turning in, tries to whip it to the on side, and is hit on the pad
full outside off, Malik backs away and tries to lift it over the off side field, ends up slicing it over point
moves down the track, Yusuf shortens the length, heaved away to long-on
What does he do first ball? Oh .. easy  .. four. He moves outside leg and lifts it inside-out to the cover boundary
And he is gone now. He moved outside leg stump and tried to force it to the off side but edged it to Dhoni. Four and out. Afridi has come and gone.
Malik keeps rolling on nicely. he moved out leg, Nehra offers a full toss outside off and Malik reaches out to crash it to the off-side boundary
More Violence. He cleared the front foot and swung the length delivery to the wide midwicket boundary. What a knock this has been.
he threatens to move outside leg before walking towards off, Nehra slips in a slower one, whipped away to wide long-on region
moves all around the crease, ends up outside leg and cuts it to backward point
Akmal falls first ball. A slower one, full outside off stump, Akmal moves outside leg and has a big swing to the on side and edges it behind.
outside off, angling away, steered wide of third man for couple of runs.
from round the stumps, sees Malik charging out and shortens the length, pushed away to the on side for a single
slows up the pace, Rana who had moved outside leg was made to wait and he ended up carving it over mid-off
fires it on the blockhole, dug out to the off side
flighted on the middle and leg, slower in the air, top edges the sweep to long leg where Kohli charges out but it drops short
moves down the track and drives hard to cover
fires it across really quickly but slips down the leg side. Dhoni appeals for a stumping.

he holes out after a potentially match-winning knock. he charged down the track but lifts it straight to long-on. He  was under huge pressure from critics before this game, started slowly but steadily grew in confidence to play several sparkling shot later on. Well played sir.
starts off with a slower one, outside off, edges the drive to third man
swing and a miss. Full and outside off, whooshes through to Dhoni
fullish, around off stump, edges the intended heave to Raina at backward point.
full delivery on the middle and leg, whipped past square-leg
moves outside leg, Ishant slips in a slower one full outside leg, chipped straight to mid-on
fullish, outside off, swing and a miss.

inn2.comm: bouncer first-up, outside off, Gambhir drops his wrists and sways away from the line.
on the middle stump line, on a length, turned to square-leg fielder
short in length, bouncing in towards the hips, tucked to fine-leg for a single
short in length, kicking outside off, Tendulkar guides it to backward point.
fuller, lands around off and moves away, Tendulkar covers his off stump and shoulders his arms.
pushes it wider outside off ... left alone.

short in length, on the middle and leg, Tendulkar clips it to deep backward square-leg for a single. Steady over that. There was a bouncer, couple of short of length deliveries, a fuller one and well ... a wide as well.
full in length, outside off, stays there, left alone and Akmal doesn't collect it cleanly ...
outswinger, hint of movement away, left alone
full in length, Tendulkar comes forward to drive, the bat-face shuts a bit and the ball rolls to the right of the bowler
lovely outswinger, moving late from the middle stump, squared-up Tendulkar a bit but he still manages to push out a straight face of the bat and edges it well to the left of backward point
on the front foot, tapped close to the on side and they rush across before Yousuf can swoop on the ball
slightly short in length, moves away but that length is enough for Sachin to stand tall and punch it wide of backward point fielder
length delivery on the middle, pushed towards mid-on
Shot. It was overpitched on the leg and middle, Gambhir wristed it superbly .. one bounce and over midwicket boundary. It was just a flick but it traveled.
drifting towards the pads, tucked to fine-leg for a single
back of length, angling away from Tendulkar who steers it down to third man
slips it wide down the leg side and Akmal moves to his right to collect it. Afridi rushes across to have a chat with the bowler.
Gambhir charges out and Aamer fires in a bouncer and Gambhir sways away from the line. And Aamer had a look at Gambhir and blew a kiss  ! Ah!
on the rib cage, tucked down to fine-leg for a single
back of length around off, slightly slower one, dabbed to right of backward point for a single
bouncer outside off, Tendulkar goes for the upper cut but doesn't connect. Manjrekar talks about the Tendulkar upper cut of Akhtar in 2003 and Akram drawls, " I don't remember at all Sanjay!" Ha!
slower one, full in length, Tendulkar leans forward to defend to the off side
gets forward to push it to mid-off. India 285 to win from 46.2 overs.
yet another slower one from Rana, on the leg and middle line, Tendulkar waits before working it behind square-leg.
tries another slower one but it ends up as a full toss and Gambhir swat-pulls it through midwicket.

Aamer has taken out Sachin. Aamer is delighted to say the least as he looks up to the skies and screams in joy. It was slightly slower perhaps, cutting away from Tendulkar who pushes at it but the ball angles away, kisses the edge and Akmal lunges to his right to take the catch. What a start from the youngster. Tendulkar was caught at the crease; neither forward nor back , was dragged sideways and succumbed.
short in length, angling away, Dravid goes for the cut but bottom edges it behind the wicket
fuller and slants well outside off, left alone
length delivery moving across Dravid who allows it to pass him
short in length and bouncing across Dravid who goes for the cut and is beaten
full in length outside off, Dravid leans across to defend to the off side
short in length and outside off, Dravid hops to get on top of the bounce and plays a lovely looking cut shot to the point boundary
full in length, on the middle and off, pushes it down to mid-off
around the off stump line, keeps a bit low, pushed out to point region
around the off stump line, just outside it, full in length, steered past the slip cordon and to the right of third man
around the off stump, back of length, mistimes the punchy shot to the off side
drifts to the pad, short in length, whipped to deep square-leg region for couple of runs
a very high bouncer, Gambhir ducked, Akmal jumped but the ball flies way over everybody
short in length around the off stump, cut away to point
lifting delivery, climbs almost face-high, Dravid fends it away to the on side for a single ... but he has over stepped ... Free hit
Thwack. Gambhir cleared the front foot and swung a full delivery over wide mid-on region ...
short in length, moving in, clipped to left of square-leg where Yousuf makes a fine diving stop. And Younis Khan applauds the effort.
bounces on the middle and leg side, bunted down to fine-leg region
short in length, slightly slower, wristed to square-leg
length delivery moving across Dravid who squeezes it to backward point
full in length on the off stump line, pushed to Afridi at covers
full in length pitched just outside leg stump and raps him on the pad around the leg stump line ....
outside off stump line, steered to backward point
short of length, around the off stump, tapped to the off side
very skillful shot that. It was on the off stump, not much room, but Gambhir used the slightly short of length to crouch, open the bat-face and time it through point
fuller, around the off stump, Gambhir comes forward to steer it to backward point
charges down the track, goes for a big shot but fails to connect. Akmal under-arms the throw towards the stumps, misses but Gambhir was home
on the middle, pushed to the on side for a quick single
bangs it in short on the leg stump line, Gambhir top-edges the pull to fine-leg boundary.
walks down the track, Aamer shortens the length and Gambhir edges the defensive poke to his pad. But another no ball from Aamer. Another free hit.
Violence. It was the short ball and Gambhir pulls it over midwicket boundary. That was crashed away. What's more, it's another no ball
moves outside leg stump and Aamer fires it in full just outside off and Gambhir tries to reach it but can't get bat to ball
short in length outside off, dabbed down to third man
length delivery moving across Dravid who shapes to defend and the ball runs off the face off the bat behind the stumps
another bouncing delivery, Dravid stabs it just behind his stumps, looks for a single but Gambhir says no
full in length outside off, run down to third man
hurls it full in length outside off stump, holds its line, Dravid pushes inside the line and is beaten
picks it from the middle and whips it to left of Misbah, on for Aamer I think, at deep backward square-leg
straightens outside off, guided to backward point
keeps a bit low, nothing alarming, and Dravid crouches to push it away to the off side.
short in length, Dravid goes for the pull, connects too but finds Yousuf at short midwicket
welcomes Umar Gul with a forcing shot off the back foot through extra cover. Gul dragged it slightly short and Gambhir found the timing and the placement
short in length, bouncing almost over middle stump line but Gambhir stays beside the line of the ball, just opens the bat-face and steers it past the diving backward point
on the middle and off line, tries to repeat the shot but this time the backward point lunges to his right to cut it off. But he will get a free hit next ball
Maximum. He cleared the front foot and went for a huge swing .. the ball went really high up the air but also found distance. Over midwicket. And that's his fifty. Breezy, thrilling knock
short in length, from round the stumps this time, guided to third man
short in length, on the middle but that length allows Dravid to work his wrists over time and clip it past midwicket
back of length outside off, dabbed to backward point
full in length, rushing through the corridor, Gambhir tries to run it down to through the vacant slip region and is beaten
full again, curving in towards the off stump line, Gambhir leans forward to defend
on the middle stump line, deflected to midwicket
just outside off stump, run down to Gul at third man
shapes in towards middle, leans forward to defend to the on side
cutting in to cramp Dravid who deflects it to the on side
on the leg stump line, rolls off the pad to short fine-leg region
quicker one, turns in to middle and off, worked to midwicket
fuller, outside off stump, defended on the front foot
quickish, Dravid was beaten by the length and surprised by the pace at which it skidded on and stabs it off the inner edge to square-leg
from round the stumps the left-hander, flat, quickish, turning away form the off stump, beaten on the attempted steer
drifts towards the pad, turned to short fine-leg, they think about a single but change their mind in the end
slightly short in length outside off stump, cut down to third man.
fullish on the middle stump line and Gambhir leans forward to whip it superbly through wide midwicket region. Gambhir moves to 56
switches to round the stumps and Gambhir charges down the track at him and misses the intended aggressive shot .. Akmal collects.
cuts in from outside off stump, Gambhir cuts down to third man for a single.

Gambhir is run out! It was pushed towards mid-off where Younis Khan swoops on the ball and fires in a direct hit to take out Gambhir. Have to see the replay to see who called whom. Neither batsman ran too far out but Gambhir couldn't get back in time. There was no run it as Younis was standing pretty close.. huge strike for Pakistan. Gambhir was batting like a dream but he is gone now. Ok replays in. Dravid took couple of steps with the shot and shouted out no .. Gambhir too had not run far off but he didn't make frantic effort to get back in....
outside off stump, steered to third man
picks it from the middle stump line and flicks it past the diving short fine-leg
leans foward to defend
gets forward to defend
plays the paddle sweep to get a single
top spinner on the off stump line, defended on the back foot
good leg cutter around the off stump, Kohli pushes inside the line and is beaten
leans forward to defend another leg cutter and edges it down the ground to slip
short in length outside off, run down to Ajmal at third man
Dravid gets into the free-hit act. He moves the front leg out of the way and crashes the full delivery to wide long-on boundary
high bouncer and Dravid ducks to evade that
full in length, holding its line around the off stump, squeezed through point
just outside off stump, tapped close on the off side and both the IPL team-mates rush across for a single
leans across to on drive the flighted delivery to long-on
slower, turns in from outside off, cut to deep point region
flighted on the middle, worked to the on side
tossed up full, on driven to left of long-on and both push for the second run
full, on the off and middle, driven to long-on
deflects the delivery from the middle stump line to midwicket
comes in from outside off, pushed to mid-on
full in length and straightens outside off, Kohli pushes inside the line and is beaten as the ball holds its line
just outside the off stump line, steered to left of third man for a single.
short in length around the off stump, again straightening, Dravid adjusts by opening the bat-face and running it down to third man
full in length outside off stump, Kohli waits for it to arrive before steering it late past the diving wide slip fielder .. neatly done

almost a run out there! It was pushed to left of covers and he sets off for a risky run but Dravid sends him back  ... the throw comes as Kohli dives to get back into the crease ... but Afride misses it. Had he hit,  Kohli would have been run out
leans forward to drive to long-on
Kohli now plays the on drive for a single
Dravid goes on the back foot to cut it to point for a run
turns in from outside off, dabbed to short third man
top spinner outside off, bounces, Kohli cuts it down to deep point
stretches forward to jab it away
drifts to the middle and leg line, clipped away for a single
leans forward to tap it to the on side
sharp turn there! It landed on a length on the middle stump lie and turned sharply past a surprised Dravid who was looking to play it to the leg side
around the off stump, takes care to play with the turn to point
fuller, on the off stump line, driven to long-off for a single
on the off stump line, driven to short extra cover
goes for the sweep, doesn't connect properly and the ball rolls to right of short fine-leg .. and Kohli calls him over for a risky single
waits for the turn to jab it to the on side
turns in from outside off, it's quick and bouncy, Kohli is beaten on the cut
stands up tall to punch it down to long-on
goes on the back foot to punch it down to long-off
on the middle stump line, Ajmal is getting the ball to skid on quickly, turned to square-leg
leans forward to drive it back to Afridi
floated full on the middle and leg, flicked past square-leg

Kohli rushes down the track and lofts it high towards long-off where Gul is stationed. Gul back-pedals to catch it but it bounds off his palms .. Gul swoops down to catch it but it again bounces off his palms but he nails it the third time!
lovely leg break ... beats Dravid all hands up .. superb delivery that. It drifted in landed on the middle, gripped before breaking away
straighter one outside off, bottom-edges the cut past Akmal for a single
goes back to tap it to the on side
flighted on a length outside off stump, driven to long-on
stretches forward to push it back to the bowler
Dropped by Akmal. Tough chance.  T'was a  topspinner outside off stump, Dhoni tries to cover drive, edges and it deflects to Akmal's right pad
leans forward to defend to the on side
plays the paddle sweep to pick up couple of runs
Ajmal, again, extracts some sharp bounce here and a surprised Dhoni stabs it to backward point region

charges down the track, tries to turn it to the on side , misses and it rolls off the pad to fine-leg ... It hit him on the middle and leg stump line .. huge shout from Afridi but Taufel turns it down
plays the paddle sweep to collect a run
skidding on towards off stump, defended to covers

Afridi nails his man this time. He had a huge shout for lbw few balls before but Dhoni survived that. Dhoni again skipped down the track and yet again, missed the wristy dab to the on side. The ball  turned towards the middle stump and hit him low on the pad. Taufel sends Dhoni on his way. Two quick wickets and Pakistan move ahead in the contest. That's plumb. It would have taken out the middle
off spinner this time, rolls off the pad to the on side
leans forward to push it to the off side
flighted around the off stump line, driven to long-off
turns in from outside off stump, defended on the front foot
goes well back to clip it to deep square-leg region to pick up two runs
flighted outside off, Dravid stretches out to push it down to long-off
leg break around the off stump, squeezed to left of short third man
goes for the pull, doesn't connect it well and the ball rolls through midwicket
leans forward to drive the ball from the middle stump line to long-on
low dipping full toss, punched down to long-on
skids on from short of length, cut down to Ajmal to sweeper cover
huge shout for lbw .. leg break turning in to strike the pad, going down leg, though
sweeps a full delivery to square of fine leg for two
another no-ball, free hit coming up, this one was defended off the back foot
Dravid charges down the wicket, fires in a quick leg-side yorker, gets a dot
gets on to the front foot, and plays it down to long-on for one
angled from round the stumps, into the pads, and played to square leg for one
flicked away from outside off, for one to square leg
short, cut away to deep point, gets one
leans forward to push it back to Afridi
on the middle and leg, shapes to sweep but doesn't connect properly
goes on the back foot to force it from the off and middle line to long-on
short of length, skidding away from Raina who cuts to deep point
slows up the pace, outside off on a length, Rahul stretches across to drive to sweeper cover
leans forward to drive to long-off
length delivery straightening on the off stump line, defended back down the pitch
going down the leg side, Raina shuffles to try to play the leg glance but no wood on leather
goes back and across to defend back to the bowler
length delivery but width outside off and Raina stretches across to lift it  on the up over backward point .. very nicely played
hangs on the back foot to guide it to backward point
Stunning hit! length delivery outside off stump, Raina just fisted it on the up to the straight boundary. He just knifed through the line. Fab strike.
high bouncer and Raina goes down under
short in length, turning away, Dravid cuts it for a single
slower in the air, leg break outside off, defended on the front foot
googly on the middle stump line, guided to point
stays back to force it down to Yousuf at long-on
flighted outside off stump, Raina chips down the track and drives it neatly through extra cover
flighted fuller around the leg stump line, edges the intended on drive to right of short fine-leg
leans forward to whip it past square-leg
short in length, straightening outside off stump, Dravid tries to turn it to third man but pushes inside the line and is beaten
on the middle and off, short in length, Dravid clips it from there to deep square-leg
from round the stumps, bouncing delivery and Raina hops to defend. Harsh call for no ball . Free hit coming up, though.

slighly slower one outside off stump, Raina waited to force it high towards deep point where Aamer strangely goes for a tough catch (it's a no ball!)  lunging forward instead of stepping back and save the boundary ..
the bouncer arrives now and Raina manages to yank his head away in time.
short in length on the middle, Raina chips it in the air down the track and Gul dives forward but can't reach the ball to catch it
Dravid reaches his fifty with a cut shot to sweeper cover. Just a little raise of the bat from him. He has played well, doing his role. 50 from 74 balls.
skids on towards middle stump, punched square through point to bring up the 50 of the partnership
leg break around the off stump, pushed to point
stretches well forward to cream the flighted leg break to left of long-off
skids on, beats the waft and hits the pad outside leg stump
reaches out to try hit a wide delivery but mistimes it to extra cover
flighted on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
comes down the track and drives  back to the bowler; Dravid dives to get back in his crease
flighted on the middle, from round the stumps, Raina clears the front foot, goes down on his back kneed and swings it across the line to wide midwicket boundary. Raina is taking them on here.
Classy hit. He sashays down the track and plays a inside-out drive to the extra-cover boundary. "Body language of Pakistan has gone down a bit, " says Wasim Akram
Thump! He went down on his back knee to play a huge slog sweep, Massive strike that. The white ball is flying every where this over. What a over this is turning out to be for India
and this time plays a careful defensive stroke
backs away a bit to cut it to cover
leans forward to rotate the strike with a on drive to long-on
from round the stumps, skids on from back of length, from just outside off, Raina is beaten on the cut
slows up the pace this time, flights it outside off on a length, draws Raina forward into a drive and raina edges it to backward square-leg
leans forward to quietly tap it to cover point for a single
moves down the track and goes for a big lofted shot but edges it down to long-on
quickish, flat trajectory on the off and middle, pushed down to on side for a single
turning in, runs off the pad to the on side
leans forward to squeeze it past square-leg
just outside off stump, tries to run it down to third man and is beaten
skids on from outside off, toppie, Raina is beaten on the cut here .

really quick delivery, almost a yorker gets Raina who is not too pleased. He reckons there is some inside edge. Pad or bat first. First quick replay is not too conclusive. He was trying to dig it out and it hit both bat and pad. What did it hit first? Will confirm after replays. Huge wicket. Raina was playing very well. This fascinating game continues to see-saw.

Replays in. Tough to call here. there was boot, bat and ball all close together! and then the bat and pad jammed almost simultaneously. Very close call .. Bob Willis reckons there was no boot and it hit the bat marginally ahead of pad. Not every one is sure. Very tough call.
just outside off stump, skidding on quickly, dravid is beaten on the jab-shot and is hit on the back pad outside the off stump
slows up the pace and DRavid drives it down to long-off
tries to sweep but doesn't connect well
wide outside the off stump
leans forward to defend
on the front foot to defend
leans forward to defend to the off side
short in length, lands outside leg, moves in, turned to square-leg for a single
short in length, angling away, dabbed to backward point
length delivery slanting across Dravid who pushes at it and gets a leading edge through cover point
short in length, on the off stump, cut down to third man
full in length, moving right across Yusuf who pushes indie the line and is beaten. He was very late in moving forward
fuller, outside off, mistimes the drive to the off side
leans forward to drive to long-on for a single
leans forward to lift it in the air towards deep midwicket
stretches really across, reaches for the slower flighted delivery and squeezes it in the air through cover point
flighted full outside off, driven hard to long-off
short in length, skids on just outside off, dragged through midwicket
flighted full on the middle and leg, driven to long-on. Afridi's fine spell comes to an end.
wide lone slip in place. Length delivery on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
And Yusuf edges straight to that lone wide, almost third, slip! Aamer strikes. It was full and moving away from Yusuf who tries to swing it over mid-on and gets a fat edge. Gone!
really full in length, pushed back to the bowler
full in length around the off stump, pushed down to cover
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed down towards mid-off for a single
full pitched around the off stump line, off drive down to long-off to retain the strike
length delivery on the off stump line, steered to cover point for a single
full in length outside off, square driven to deep point
superb piece of timing. It was on the middle, Dravid held his balance to clip it neatly just wide of deep square-leg fielder
drifts towards middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket region
slower one outside off, Harbhajan adjusts to run it down to third man
another slower one, slipping towards the pads, flicked away to fine-leg for a single
short in length on the off stump line, Dravid tries to run it down to third man but can't beat backward point
leans forward and pushes at the ball and the ball goes in the air but it lands safely before mid-off. Perhaps it stopped on him a bit
stays back to push the ball to the off side
short of length, rushing towards the off stump, lovely nagging line and length, defended to the off side
the tight line continues; Harbhajan pushes this back to the bowler
length delivery on the middle and Harbhajan swings it high over wide midwicket for couple of runs. He swatted that away.
full pitched on the off and middle, driven to left of long-off for couple of runs
slower one on a length outside off, Dravid drives it to long-off for a single
almost yorker length outside off, Harbhajan had backed away outside leg stump and can't reach the ball. Dravid gets across to have a chat
stays at his crease this time, has a big swing across the line but misses it completely and the ball rushes past the off stump
fullish, driven straight to covers where Afridi fumbles but recovers quickly

Dravid is run out. It was a low dipping slower one, full outside off, Dravid lunged out to drive it through covers. Harbhajan called him for the third run and sent him back ... yes and no ... Dravid is also cramped up as he tries to get back and lunges in the end but Akmal breaks the stumps. Good throw from Gul from the deep. Third umpire says, rightly,  that's out. Dravid looks pretty shattered as he walks back. Good innings ... close but no cigar
tries to sweep, misses and collects the wide
plays the paddle, doesn't connect properly and the ball rolls to short fine-leg
leans forward to push the ball to extra cover for a single
outside off stump, goes on straight, beaten on the drive
And again. too good for RP
mistimes the drive to extra cover. Fine over comes to an end.
moves outside leg stump and drags it down to long-on
goes for a big swing across the line but the ball rolls back down the pitch to the bowler
low full toss on the middle, swatted to Yousuf at midwicket. He has a shy at the non-striker's end
A slower one and RP has a big swing at this and skies it towards deep midwicket ... Yousuf rushes in from the deep to take a neat catch . Pakistan inch closer
full pitched around the off stump, driven to sweeper cover
Clatter! The yorker disturbs the furniture. Ishant can't get his bat down in time adn the leg stump is uprooted. Just one more wicket now for Pakistan
leans forward to try to play a defensive shot and it rolls off the pad
tries to sweep from outside off but misses it completely
outside off stump and this time he crashes it to the point boundary
slows up the pace ,loopy delivery, dabbed to short third man

Pakistan win by 54 runs! Harbhajan Singh goes for the reverse sweep and misses it completely. And the crowd rush into the middle and the players who were about to get into a celebratory huddle rush away to the safety of the boundary. Fine win for Pakistan. Yousuf and Malik set it up with their outstanding partnership before the bowlers did enough to do the job.
